that is mobile contactless  get 10x points for anything not in exclusion list.For online (via metchant website/app) only the selected MCC gets 10x points. E.g. Fairprice website is under supermarket mcc and online  so get 10x points

Hi there  wanted to check on how to do the PayNow via Giro from UOB to OCBC to earn the Salary bonus for OCBC 360 account. Any idea how to enable the giro from uob internet banking or I need to submit some forms for it to be enabled?
You need to start a company and open a corporate bank account. Alternatively you can get your HR to credit salary to your OCBC 360 account instead.
Worked for me with a non-corporate account  as long as it's a different account holder name
Patched already. On the 8th you can check again
They will send you the confirmation anytime from 1 Aug to 31 Aug
